headline: Edison International: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif. AP) — Edison International (EIX) on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter earnings of $1.92 billion. On a per-share basis, the Rosemead, California-based company said it had net income of $4.79.

raw.headline: Edison International: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif. AP) — Edison International (EIX) on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter earnings of $1.92 billion. On a per-share basis, the Rosemead, California-based company said it had net income of $4.79.

headline: Southern California Edison Strengthens Support for Impacted Altadena Community Members
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., February 18, 2026--Today, Southern California Edison announced enhancements to bring even more relief to eligible community members through its voluntary Wildfire Recovery Compensation Program. Effective immediately and applied retroactively, these updates strengthen support for eligible individuals and businesses impacted by the Eaton Fire by increasing coverage for legal expenses and enhancing support for displaced renters.

raw.headline: Southern California Edison Strengthens Support for Impacted Altadena Community Members
raw.summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., February 18, 2026--Today, Southern California Edison announced enhancements to bring even more relief to eligible community members through its voluntary Wildfire Recovery Compensation Program. Effective immediately and applied retroactively, these updates strengthen support for eligible individuals and businesses impacted by the Eaton Fire by increasing coverage for legal expenses and enhancing support for displaced renters.

headline: Edison International, Southern California Edison Declare Dividends
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., February 18, 2026--The board of directors of Edison International (NYSE: EIX) today declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.8775 per share, to be paid on April 30, 2026, to holders of record on April 7, 2026.

raw.headline: Edison International, Southern California Edison Declare Dividends
raw.summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., February 18, 2026--The board of directors of Edison International (NYSE: EIX) today declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.8775 per share, to be paid on April 30, 2026, to holders of record on April 7, 2026.

headline: Edison International Reports Fourth Quarter and Full-Year 2025 Results
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., February 18, 2026--Edison International (NYSE: EIX) today reported fourth-quarter net income of $1,848 million, or $4.80 per share, compared to net income of $340 million, or $0.88 per share, in the fourth quarter of last year. As adjusted, fourth-quarter core earnings were $717 million, or $1.86 per share, compared to core earnings of $405 million, or $1.05 per share, in the fourth quarter of last year.

raw.headline: Edison International Reports Fourth Quarter and Full-Year 2025 Results

As adjusted, fourth-quarter core earnings were $717 million, or $1.86 per share, compared to core earnings of $405 million, or $1.05 per share, in the fourth quarter of last year.

headline: PG&E Starting To Climb Out Of Valuation Pit
summary: PG&E Corporation reaffirmed its positive earnings and growth forecasts. Click here to read why I'm elevating PCG stock to a Buy.
